flawed_nl_solution:
Bob runs .1 miles per minute because 6 / 60 = <<6/60=0.1>>0.1
Jim run at .15 miles per minute 9 / 60 = <<9/60=0.15>>0.15
Therefore 1 = 0.04999999999999999(Number of minutes)
Therefore (Number of minutes) = 2 because 1 / 0.04999999999999999 = <<1/0.04999999999999999=2>>2

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 20.000000000000004, not 2.0. It appears the decimal point was misplaced.
